```{julia}
using GLMakie,AlgebraOfGraphics
using DataFrames  
ran=range(0,2pi,200)
rans=[range(0,2pi,s) for s in 3:10]
r=1
fig=Figure(resolution = (600, 760))
for  (idx,side) in enumerate(4:15)
    ax=Axis(fig[fldmod1(idx,3)...])
    lran=range(0,2pi,side)
    points=[Point2f(cos(i),sin(i)) for i in lran]
    lines!(ax,r*cos.(ran),r*sin.(ran))
    poly!(ax,points,color=(:green,0.2))
    text!(0, 0, text = rich("A", subscript("$(side-1)")), align = (:center, :center))
    hidedecorations!(ax)
end
fig
```
